DOC.brief_summary: In case of a cardiac arrest it is very important to quickly provide high quality cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR). For reasons of patient safety the investigators want to assess the frequency, the quality and the outcome of cardiopulmonary resuscitations in the Inselspital Bern.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Assessment Project About Cardiac Arrest Resuscitation
DOC.criteria: Every patient for which the alarm button for a cardiopulmonary arrest gets triggered
